flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.summary: Think you would like getting into Biathlon or plinking (low cal target shooting) but don't have the budget for a 1200$ gun? Then this Project is right for you! I will go over the construction of an air rifle that shoots 1/4" plastic darts.
guide.title: Making an Air Dart Rifle
